thread.title: Brooklyn Landlords Slash Rents to Attract Tenants

author: Josh Barbanel
title: Brooklyn Landlords Slash Rents to Attract Tenants
text:
Brooklynâ€™s apartment market is cooling faster than a cup of green matcha on a winter morning.
A building binge in recent years has swelled supplies of new apartments for rent, forcing landlords to offer steep concessions such as months of free rent to convince potential tenants to sign leases.
